test-results.name: OpenTofu Lab Automation - Bulletproof Quick Tests

test-suite.name: OpenTofu Lab Automation - Bulletproof Quick Tests

test-case.description: Should exit gracefully with helpful message when no scripts specified
test-case.name: CoreApp Non-Interactive Mode.Basic Non-Interactive Mode.Should exit gracefully with helpful message when no scripts specified

test-case.description: Should respect verbosity levels in non-interactive mode
test-case.name: CoreApp Non-Interactive Mode.Basic Non-Interactive Mode.Should respect verbosity levels in non-interactive mode

failure.message: Expected the actual value to be less than 12, but got 12.

test-case.description: Should handle missing configuration files gracefully
test-case.name: CoreApp Non-Interactive Mode.Basic Non-Interactive Mode.Should handle missing configuration files gracefully

test-case.description: Should execute all scripts in WhatIf mode without errors
test-case.name: CoreApp Non-Interactive Mode.Auto Mode Non-Interactive.Should execute all scripts in WhatIf mode without errors

test-case.description: Should handle Auto mode with Force parameter
test-case.name: CoreApp Non-Interactive Mode.Auto Mode Non-Interactive.Should handle Auto mode with Force parameter

test-case.description: Should complete within reasonable time limits
test-case.name: CoreApp Non-Interactive Mode.Auto Mode Non-Interactive.Should complete within reasonable time limits

test-case.description: Should execute a specific script in WhatIf mode
test-case.name: CoreApp Non-Interactive Mode.Specific Script Execution.Should execute a specific script in WhatIf mode
CoreApp Non-Interactive Mode.Specific Script Execution.Should handle multiple specific scripts
CoreApp Non-Interactive Mode.Specific Script Execution.Should handle nonexistent script gracefully

test-suite.name: CoreApp Non-Interactive Mode.Error Handling and Edge Cases
test-suite.description: CoreApp Non-Interactive Mode.Error Handling and Edge Cases

test-case.description: Should handle empty script parameter gracefully
test-case.name: CoreApp Non-Interactive Mode.Error Handling and Edge Cases.Should handle empty script parameter gracefully

test-case.description: Should properly detect non-interactive mode automatically
test-case.name: CoreApp Non-Interactive Mode.Error Handling and Edge Cases.Should properly detect non-interactive mode automatically

test-case.description: Should maintain consistent exit codes across runs
test-case.name: CoreApp Non-Interactive Mode.Error Handling and Edge Cases.Should maintain consistent exit codes across runs

test-suite.name: CoreApp Non-Interactive Mode.Logging and Output Verification
test-suite.description: CoreApp Non-Interactive Mode.Logging and Output Verification

test-case.description: Should create proper log entries with timestamps
test-case.name: CoreApp Non-Interactive Mode.Logging and Output Verification.Should create proper log entries with timestamps

failure.message: Expected '[INFO]' to be found in collection @('[2025-06-19 20:11:11.015] [SUCCESS] [Initialize-Loggin...] Logging system initialized', '[2025-06-19 20:11:11.092] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Core runner started', '[2025-06-19 20:11:11.095] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Loading configuration from: /workspaces/opentofu-lab-automation/core-runner/core_app/default-config.json', '[2025-06-19 20:11:11.103] [SUCCESS] [core-runner.ps1 ] Starting OpenTofu Lab Automation Core Runner', '[2025-06-19 20:11:11.105] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Repository root: /workspaces/opentofu-lab-automation', '[2025-06-19 20:11:11.107] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Configuration file: /workspaces/opentofu-lab-automation/core-runner/core_app/default-config.json', '[2025-06-19 20:11:11.109] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Verbosity level: detailed', '[2025-06-19 20:11:11.118] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Found 38 scripts', '[2025-06-19 20:11:11.120] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Non-interactive mode: use -Scripts parameter to specify which scripts to run, or -Auto for all scripts', '[2025-06-19 20:11:11.122] [WARN ] [core-runner.ps1 ] No scripts specified for non-interactive execution', ...2 more), but it was not found.

test-case.name: CoreApp Non-Interactive Mode.Logging and Output Verification.Should include module initialization messages

test-case.description: Should handle paths correctly on current platform

failure.message: Expected 'Configuration file:' to be found in collection @('[2025-06-19 20:11:13.924] [SUCCESS] [Initialize-Loggin...] Logging system initialized', '[2025-06-19 20:11:14.012] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Core runner started', '[2025-06-19 20:11:14.016] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Loading configuration from: /workspaces/opentofu-lab-automation/core-runner/core_app/default-config.json', '[2025-06-19 20:11:14.023] [SUCCESS] [core-runner.ps1 ] Starting OpenTofu Lab Automation Core Runner', '[2025-06-19 20:11:14.026] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Repository root: /workspaces/opentofu-lab-automation', '[2025-06-19 20:11:14.028] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Configuration file: /workspaces/opentofu-lab-automation/core-runner/core_app/default-config.json', '[2025-06-19 20:11:14.030] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Verbosity level: detailed', '[2025-06-19 20:11:14.038] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Found 38 scripts', '[2025-06-19 20:11:14.040] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Non-interactive mode: use -Scripts parameter to specify which scripts to run, or -Auto for all scripts', '[2025-06-19 20:11:14.043] [WARN ] [core-runner.ps1 ] No scripts specified for non-interactive execution', ...2 more), but it was not found.

test-case.description: Should work with different configuration file paths
